text:
Let us have a closer look at(Rn×n,·), i.e., the set ofn×n-matrices with
matrix multiplication as deﬁned in (2.13).
– Closure and associativity follow directly from the deﬁnition of matrix
multiplication.
– Neutral element: The identity matrix In is the neutral element with
respect to matrix multiplication “·” in(Rn×n,·).
Draft (2019-10-15) of “Mathematics for Machine Learning”. Feedback:https://mml-book.com.
